definitions: To care for (a sick or injured person or animal).
To feed a baby at the breast; to breastfeed.
To hold carefully or treat tenderly.
To try to cure or restore to health.
To foster or encourage the development of something.
examples: She decided to nurse her ailing mother back to health.
The mother will nurse her infant.
He nursed a cup of coffee for an hour.
They nursed the small plant back to life.
He nursed a grudge for years.
